resources.string: How do I access the Mobile Check Deposit service?

You must already be enrolled in the Discover Account Center. Once enrolled, you can download the Discover App from your App store to your Smartphone. Log into the Discover App and click on the Check Deposit tab. Follow the simple instructions to submit your check deposit.
What kind of checks can I deposit with this service?

Checks payable to you, in U.S. dollars and drawn on any U.S. bank including, but not limited to the following:
Personal checks
Business checks
US Treasury checks

You may deposit up to 50 checks per day. 

For savings and money market accounts, there is a limit of $5,000 per check, $25,000 per month. 

For checking accounts, there is a limit of $1,000 per check, $5,000 per day and $15,000 per month. 

Accounts that have been open for less than 6 months may have reduced limits.
Are there any fees to use the Mobile Check deposit service?
No. There are no fees to use this service. Message and data rates may apply.
When will my deposit be posted to my account?

Deposits received and accepted by 6:30 P.M. Eastern Time on a business day will be posted to your account on that day. Deposits received and accepted after this time will be posted the following business day.
When will my deposit be available for withdrawal?

For savings and money market accounts the funds will be available the 5th business day after the day of deposit. \n\nFor checking accounts, $200 will be available the next day, the remainder the 2nd business day after the day of deposit. For new customers for the first 30 days, $200 will be available the next day, the remainder the 7th business day after the day of deposit.
What should I do with my check after I deposit it?
After your deposit has been credited to your account, mark it void and store it in a secure location for 90 days.
What if my check deposit is rejected?
If your check is rejected, you will receive a notification via e-mail. You may log into the Account Center for a secure message that will provide the reason the check was rejected.
What if my check amount exceeds the deposit limit?

Mail the check that includes your account number, made payable to you or Discover Bank to: 

Discover Bank 
PO Box 30417 
Salt Lake City, UT 84130
